about_the_game:
||Epic Journey||

Introduction for Andalas, an Indie RPG Adventure Fantasy Game with mesmerizing puzzles and heartwarming story. Step into the mesmerizing realm of Andalas, where magic and mystery intertwine to create an unforgettable journey. Get ready to embark on an exhilarating adventure unlike any other as you dive into the heart of this captivating world.

  • In Andalas, you'll follow the courageous footsteps of Rei, a spirited young soul plagued by mysterious affliction within his mind. But fear not, for Rei's determination to overcome this challenge knows no bounds. As he traverses the enchanting landscapes of Andalas, encounters fantastical creatures and mind-bending puzzles, you'll be swept up in a whirlwind of excitements and discoveries.

  • Embrace the magical power bestowed upon you by the Elders. Use your gifts to confront mythical monsters, unravel puzzles, and embark on a journey through the vast open world.

  • Help Rei build a vibrant village for the citizens of Andalas. Explore the area to find hidden NPCs, each offering unique skills and resources that will enhance the village's functionality and prosperity. Work together to create a thriving community!

||Explore More!||

In Andalas, exploration is limitless with four unique navigation modes:

  • Air: Soar above the vast landscapes and uncover hidden treasures from a bird's-eye view.

  • Land: Trek through forests, mountains, and mystical terrains filled with puzzles and secrets.

  • Water: Glide across serene lakes and powerful rivers to reach distant locations.

  • Underwater: Dive into the depths to explore ancient ruins and uncover submerged mysteries.

Each mode lets you experience the beauty and challenges of Andalas like never before!

Not only can you explore the breathtaking landscapes on land, but you can also dive into the fascinating underwater world! From lush forests and towering mountains to vibrant coral reefs and serene ocean depths, there is so much to discover. As you wander through the diverse terrain, take the time to uncover hidden gems – whether it's a secluded waterfall, rare wildlife, or ancient ruins. Beneath the waves, you’ll encounter a rich array of marine life and stunning underwater formations, offering a unique adventure for every explorer. Embrace the thrill of uncovering the secrets that await you both above and below the surface!

name: ANDALAS : Realms of Eternal Lights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4460 / Core™ i3 9100F / AMD FX™-6300 / Ryzen™ 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 / Intel Arc A380
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Join Rei, a brave boy battling brain cancer, on a quest to save the enchanting land of Andalas. Customize your adventure by using tools and items to defeat monsters, transform into powerful ancient figures, and summon Companion pets. Collect relics to uncover secrets and rescue Andalas!
